turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice to hear from you, what will it be today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks. Can you help me out, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order drink from starbucks, ok i can help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok what kind of coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to take order of caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: caramel macchiato right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And that's about it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with 2% milk, ok What size would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: grande caramel macchiato with 2% milk, any other flavoring?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no additional flavoring for you? got it, which store you would like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick up from South Rancho Drive in Las Vegas, Nevada.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: S Rancho Dr, Las Vegas, NV, USA is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.
